StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SPGENRECRUITER_INQUIRY]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
declare @SSN varchar(9), @person_id int, @recrui.ng_id int, @codes varchar(15), @inquiry_code varchar(2), @disposi.on_code varchar(2), @result_code varchar(2), @inquiry_org_id int, @inquiry_date date.me, @disposi.on_date date.me, @user_login varchar(15), @update_date date.me
declare arms_inquiry cursor for
select SSN,II_CODE,II_DATE,II_DISP_CD,II_DISP_DTE from arms..arms_inquiry
open arms_inquiry
fetch arms_inquiry into @ssn,@inquiry_code,@inquiry_date,@codes,@disposi.on_date
set @update_date = getdate() set @user_login = 'migra.on' set @inquiry_org_id = NULL
while (@@FETCH_STATUS = 0) begin
set @disposi.on_code = substring(@codes,2,1) set @result_code = substring(@codes,3,1) set @inquiry_date = convert (date.me,@inquiry_date,112) set @disposi.on_date = convert (date.me,@disposi.on_date,112)
print @ssn
set @person_id = (select PERSON_ID from PERSON where SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @ssn)
set @recrui.ng_id = @person_id if @recrui.ng_id is not NULL begin insert RECRUITER_INQUIRY (INQUIRY_CODE, DISPOSITION_CODE,RESULT_CODE,RECRUITING_PERSON_ID,INQUIRY_ORGANIZATION_ID, INQUIRY_DATE,DISPOSITION_DATE,USER_LOGIN,UPDATE_DATE)
values (@inquiry_code,@disposi.on_code,@result_code,@recrui.ng_id,@inquiry_org_id,@inquiry_date, @disposi.on_date,@user_login,@update_date) end else begin print @ssn+'is NULL' end fetch arms_inquiry into @ssn,@inquiry_code,@inquiry_date,@codes,@disposi.on_date
end
close arms_inquiry
deallocate arms_inquiry
